means: （指士兵的行列等）密集的，靠紧的

sentence.Network_en: The fields were mostly patches laid on the serried landscape, between crevices and small streams.
sentence.Network_cn: 农田大部分是地缝和小溪之间的条状小块.

sentence.Network_en: Above the bush the trees stood in serried ranks.
sentence.Network_cn: 荆棘之上耸立着密密麻麻的大树.

PerfectNetExp.abs: 词根及词缀 ... serration n 矩尺状 serried a 拥挤的，密集的 settle v 固定；安居.

list.abs: design of the electric serried shelf ., 电动密集架的研制.
combining with the reinforcing design practice for a bank s serried cabinet muniment room , the article presents the reinforcing design steps .文章结合某银行增设密集柜后加固设计实例，通过对其加固设计思路的描述说明此类加固工程设计的做法。
design of the electric serried shelf ., 电动密集架的研制.
Above the bush the trees stood in serried ranks ., 荆棘之上耸立着密密麻麻的大树.
troops in serried ranks ., 排列密集的军队.

derivation.yuyuan_name: mid 17th cent.: past participle of serry 'press close', probably from French serré 'close together', based on Latin sera 'lock'

entry.tran: (人或事物)密排的，密集的，排紧的
entry.def: Serried things or people are closely crowded together in rows.

example.ex: ...serried rows of law books and law reports.
example.tran: 排得密密匝匝的几排法律书籍和判例汇编
一排排人挤人的崇拜者

means.word_mean: 1. (especially of rows as of troops or mountains) pressed together;

auth_sentence.content: Tables carrying a wide assortment of glasses in serried ranks.
auth_sentence.res_content: Tables carrying a wide assortment of glasses in serried ranks.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Tables carrying a wide assortment of glasses in serried ranks.

auth_sentence.content: Those back-to-back, serried houses of the Midlands.
auth_sentence.res_content: Those back-to-back, serried houses of the Midlands.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Those back-to-back, serried houses of the Midlands.

stems_affixes.word_buile: serrate[adj.锯齿状的 v.使成锯齿状]+ed……的→像锯子一样的
serr锯子+ate表动词和形容词→adj.锯齿状的 v.使成锯齿状

锯齿状, 锯齿状突起
